output_data.clarification_question: Please specify the total time spent face-to-face with the patient, or the start and end times of the session, as the duration is required to select the appropriate E/M and psychotherapy codes.
output_data.suggested_answer: 45 minutes to 55 minutes total session time (consistent with 99214/90836 combination)?

primary_code.rationale: Code selection is pending confirmation of total time and Medical Decision Making complexity, but the depth of discussion (safety assessment, worsening *Major Depression*, medication titration from 50mg to 100mg of *Sertraline*) strongly suggests high complexity/99214 level of service.

addon_codes.rationale: Based on the extensive safety review, symptom review, exploration of passive ideation ('Sometimes I think they'd be better off...'), and motivational interviewing, 45 minutes of psychotherapy was clearly integrated into the management service. Final code (90833, 90836, or 90838) is dependent on confirmed time.

output_data.medical_necessity: Recurrent Major Depressive Disorder, Moderate (F33.1). The complexity is driven by the failure of initial *Sertraline* dosage, worsening symptoms, and necessary safety assessment/medication titration.
